name: remote-file-watcher
description: Watch remote files via SSH and execute local commands on change

remoteFileWatcher.showNotifications.description: Show notification popups when files change. Disable to only execute commands silently.

remoteFileWatcher.watchers.markdownDescription:
Configure files to watch and commands to execute when they change.

**To configure with GUI:** Open Command Palette (`Ctrl+Shift+P`) and run `Remote File Watcher: Configure Watchers`

Or edit in settings.json below for advanced users.

filePath.title: File Path
filePath.description: Relative path from workspace root to the file to watch (e.g., .claude-notification-trigger)

command.title: Command
command.description: Command to execute when file changes. Use ${file} as placeholder for the file path.
